project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file to calculate and display the mean, median, and mode for user-specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement feature to read CSV file
Implement feature to allow user to specify numerical columns
Implement calculation of mean for specified numerical columns
Implement calculation of median for specified numerical columns
Implement calculation of mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for the implemented features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
